author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: The Raspberry Pi Foundation has introduced the M.2 HAT+ Compact, a smaller version of its original M.2 HAT+ designed for the Raspberry Pi 5. This new variant allows a 2230-format M.2 PCIe device, such as an NVMe SSD or AI accelerator, to fit neatly inside the official Raspberry Pi 5 case alongside the integrated cooling […]
title: Raspberry Pi M.2 HAT+ Compact Released with 2230 NVMe Support
